subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Two years ago, the Mets were 20 games under .500.  Today, they are on the verge of clinching the N.L. East and winning their first division championship in 18 years.
snippet: Two years ago, the Mets were 20 games under .500.  Today, they are on the verge of clinching the N.L. East and winning their first division championship in 18 years.
